title: Aural set, round dance - 2nd section texture

content.description: You will hear an excerpt of piano music that is in two sections. The first section will be played two times; then the second section will be played two times. Before listening to each section the first time, please read the questions.
content.question: After the introduction, the texture in the second section is

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.G: Use terms and symbols to describe aspects of musical design in performed music, including texture, timbre, and instrumentation, and expressive elements, including dynamics, articulation, and tempo.
